snippet: Some investment professionals are claiming that Facebook is worth only $75 billion or even $50 billion. But the Deal Professor says that does not mean Facebook stock will not trade at a price giving the company that vaunted $100 billion valuation.
abstract: Some investment professionals are claiming that Facebook is worth only $75 billion or even $50 billion. But the Deal Professor says that does not mean Facebook stock will not trade at a price giving the company that vaunted $100 billion valuation.
lead_paragraph: A hundred billion dollars. That is the number whispered for Facebook's value after the social networking company has its initial public offering.

headline.main: A $100 Billion Value for Facebook? That May Be Possible
